They all live in large, traditional families in Kangaré, in the prefecture of Yanfolila (Sikasso region of the Republic of Mali).  They have all been successfully running different small businesses for several years.

Mamou (standing on the far right in the photo) sells food ingredients such as tomatoes, onions and cabbage.  The members of the group would all like to be able to respond to the needs of their customers, so they work with the field partner, Soro Yiriwaso, this will be their second group loan.  Mamou is the group president and excels in the sale of food ingredients.  She will use her loan to buy ten baskets of tomatoes and two sacks of onions, from wholesalers locally and in Selingue.  She sells her produce in Kangaré to both men and women, for cash or on credit.

Mamou hopes to earn 30,000 francs CFA a month which will enable her to repay her loan and invest in her food business.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients for resale.

loans.name: Nuriniso

texts.en:
Nuriniso was born in 1985. She is an industrious woman with a kind heart. Nuriniso is married and has three children. She lives with her family in a rural area. So, she has a good opportunity to organize a business with animal husbandry. She took part in a course, ‘To Get Ahead’ at a women's organization. Nuriniso got a certificate. 

She is going to organize a business with animal husbandry. She will feed sheep. Nuriniso’s children will help her to feed cattle. 

Nuriniso is asking for a loan of TJS 600 (somoni) to buy cattle as she organizes her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is married and has four children. She lives in Dimiao, Bohol. She is engaged in food vending, selling home cooked snack foods such as banana cues. She also sells soap. 

Ana requested a loan, which she will use to buy ingredients such as bananas, flour, sugar, and cooking oil as well as facial soap. With this loan, she will be able to improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to purchase items such as bananas, flour, sugar, cooking oil and facial soap

loans.name: Ny's Group

texts.en:
Ny is 47 years old, from a rural village located in Battambang province and she is a married mother, blessed with four children. 

To support her family, Ny has been in rice farming as the main source of her income and she also works as a paid worker for supplemental income. She has occupied the business for ages and it has returned her KHR 35,600 per day. This is the eighth-cycle loan for her with VisionFund Cambodia (Kiva’s partner) and she is leading a group of four. 

As the leader, Ny will use her portion of the loan to pay for labor to plow the field. She hopes to gain a good crop yield, so as to increase her income.

loans.use: to pay for labor to plow the field.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 21 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 5  años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia , El cliente esta slicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y asi poder tener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Our client is 21 years old and he has worked in agriculture for the past 5 years.  He has the capacity and knowledge necessary to grow his crops.  His main crops are corn and beans. He sells his produce to agencies that are close to his home.  With his income, he helps pay the household expenses.  He lives with his wife and their son in their own home.

He is seeking a loan so that he can buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, seeds, herbicides, pesticides, etc. With these supplies he will be able to make a higher income and provide his family with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Scovia

texts.en: Scovia works in the cattle trade to earn money for tuition for her children who attend secondary school. She requested a loan, which she will use to buy baby cows that she will fatten and later sell at a profit. This loan will help her to provide for her family members adequately.

loans.use: to purchase cows to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a car.

loans.name: Rehema's Group

texts.en:
Rehema's group is comprised of 3 hard-working women. Rehema is 20 years old and lives in the town of Mityana in the Mubende region of Uganda. She is married and has 2 children. For the past 2 years, Rehema has been working hard to manage her food stall, which sells fresh food. 

To help expand her business, Rehema has requested a loan of 600,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more fresh food such as raw matoke (cooking bananas) to sell, and will help Rehema to generate greater profits and stock more fresh foods to sell. Rehema hopes that in the future she will be able to educate her children. 

Rehema is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more fresh food such as raw matoke to sell.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru: Хабиба молодая мама и верная жена. Ей 22 года. Она замужем. Ее муж работает продавцом на местном рынке. Хабиба с мужем, ребенком, родителями и братом мужа живет в маленьком городке Турсунзаде. Она любит семью и старается сидя дома принести пользу. Хабиба сидит дома и следит за ребенком. Она решила посадить очередной весенний урожай. Она занимается земледелием уже 3 года. Но из-за финансовых издержек семейного бюджета ей не удастся самостоятельно посадить урожай. По этой причине Хабиба просит кредит для купли семян. Поддержите ее.
texts.en: Habiba is a young mother and a faithful wife.  She is 22 years old and married.  Her husband works as a seller at the local market.  Habiba lives with her husband, their children and her husband's parents and children in the small city of Tursun-zoda.  She loves her family and tries to be useful while she stays at home and looks after the children.  She decided to plant the next spring crop.  She has been involved in agriculture for three years, but because of the financial strains of her family budget she is not able to able to do the sowing without help.  For this reason, Habiba has asked for a loan to buy seeds.  Let's support her.

loans.use: to buy all the necessary materials to complete her spring sowing.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en: Maricel is a married woman and the mother of five children. She is from Dimiao, Bohol. She is engaged in the business of raising hogs. Maricel is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. With this, she will be able to improve her hog raising business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en: Madina is married and has 2 children who are non-adults. She always wanted to provide the family with a good quality of life. She decided to start a new business in animal husbandry in order to generate an income with which she can contribute to her home’s finances. She studied a course of ‘To get Ahead’ conducted by a women's organization and got enough skills for running a business. Her husband will help her with the business. She will be a very successful businesswoman as she is hardworking and smart. She is asking for a loan of 600 TJS to buy cattle for her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle to start her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, de esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de cómo ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, las cuales son muy humildes no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Es un hombre luchador. Siempre está al pendiente de su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar un crédito ya que la temporada en la que se realiza la siembra, se aproxima, y quiere estar preparado con los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. que es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Our client is 25 years old and lives in his own home with his family.  He works in agriculture, growing corn and beans. This is how he earns a living and brings home the bread every day. He does this work each year as it is the only way he knows to earn a living.

He is a hard-working, dependable, and responsible person.  Despite the conditions in which he lives, which are very humble, he never tires of working and of providing the best for his family.  He is a fighter.  He is always thinking of his family. 

He decided to approach this institution to ask for a loan because planting season is quickly approaching and he wants to be prepared with the main agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, etc.  This is why he's seeking a loan.  He hopes to be successful as he doesn't have another source of income.  He trusts in God that he will be successful in cultivating an abundant harvest, which will help him bring home the bread to his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Irma

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad, está casada y es madre de una niña de 11 años de edad. Todos ellos viven en casa propia. Rosa tiene un pequeño negocio en su vivienda, todos los días desde muy temprano hace tortillas las que venda a buen número de personas de su localidad. Con la ganancia que el negocio le da apoya a su esposo en los gastos de su hogar. La vivienda de Rosa no posee energía eléctrica por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI un crédito para instalar y conectar la energía eléctrica en su vivienda. Rosa sabe que facilitará las labores de su negocio y el quehacer del hogar, además sabe que ayudará a su hija ya que tendrá la luz necesaria para efectuar mejor sus labores de estudio.
texts.en:
Rosa is 43 years old, she is married, and she has an 11-year-old daughter.  They live together in their own home.  Rosa has a small business in her home. Every day, beginning very early in the morning, she makes tortillas and sells them in bulk quantities to people in the region.  With the income from her business she helps her husband pay the household expenses.

Rosa's house doesn't have electricity and this is why she is seeking a loan from FUSAI.  She needs to install and connect the electrical source to her home.  Rosa knows that electricity will help her improve her business and help the household, plus her daughter will benefit from having light so that she can better study in the evenings.

loans.use: to pay for the installation and connection of electricity to her home.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe SABOUGNOUMA est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 36 ans, et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans le village de Tenimbougou, commune de Kaladougou, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de condiment, de savon, et d’article divers. Les femmes du groupe SABOUGNOUMA sont à leur cinquième prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO. 
La cliente MAH la première personne à partir de la gauche n’est pas instruite, elle est actuellement vendeuse de divers. Elle compte acheter 75 kg de sucre, 2 cartons de thé, et des sachets plastiques chez les grossistes à Dioïla. La vente se fait en détail et en espèce, chez elle à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 20 000 FCFA qui sera réinjecter dans l’activité.
texts.en:
Sabougnouma is a group of married women who are on average 36 years old and have an average of 5 children. They all live in traditional families in the Tenimbougou village, Kaladougou town, Dioïla Prefecture, Koulikoro Region (second administrative region of the Republic of Mali.)

They all know each other through their family ties, their neighborhood, and through friends. They sell condiments, soap, and sundry items. The women in the Sabougnouma group are on their fifth group loan. To meet the enormous demand of their clients, they turn to Soro Yiriwaso.

Mah, the first person on the left, is not literate. She sells sundry items. She hopes to buy 75 kg of sugar, two cartons of tea, and plastic bags from wholesalers in Dioïla. She retails her merchandise from her home and at the market to a mixed clientele. She expects to make a monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy sundry items for resale.

loans.name: Izzatoy

texts.en:
Izzatoy is a young and purposeful woman. She is married and has two children. She always wanted to be a highly-educated person, but she did not have the opportunity to get a higher education. 

Now, she needs money for living because her husband’s income is not enough to provide the family with all the necessary things. 

She is going to start a business with animal husbandry. She took part in a course, ‘To Get Ahead,’ at a women's organization. Izzatoy’s husband will help her with managing the business. She will feed a cow for some months and then sell it in a local market. 

Izzatoy is asking for a loan of TJS 600 (somoni) to buy a cow as she organizes her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase chicks and feed for poultry farming.

loans.name: Ramatoulaye Ngom's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis Décembre 2010, est constitué de 19 membres qui habitent tous dans la même localité.Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Fatou qui se trouve debout à l’extrême droite de la photo et levant le bras,âgée de 36 ans, est notre emprunteuse vedette.Elle est mariée et mère de six enfants dont 03 garçons et 03 filles.Elle fait de la restauration.
Elle investir dans le domaine de la restauration. Avec son crédit elle va acheter des denrées de première nécessité telles que du riz de l'huile et des condiments

Les objectifs visés pour son bénéfices sont d'assurer les besoins familiaux, la scolarité et la santé de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group, created in December 2010, is constituted of 19 members who all live in the same town. Their main activity is retail.

Fatou, our star borrower, is standing all the way to the right in the photo with her arm raised. She is 36 years old, married, and a mother of six--three boys and three girls.

She is in the restaurant business. With her credit, she plans to buy staples items such as rice, oil, and condiments.

With the profits, her objectives are to provide for the family, and to pay her children's school and healthcare expenses.

loans.use: to buy staple items to develop her restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies and an embroidering machine

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is widowed and has two children. She is from Dimiao, Bohol. Marietta is engaged in retail sales of food supplements, coffee, soap, and cosmetics.

Marietta requested a loan, which she will use to buy more stocks to sell such as food supplements, coffee, beverages, soap, and cosmetics. With this loan, she will be able to sell more products to her customers. In the future, Marietta hopes to improve her business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to purchase food supplements, coffee,  beverages, soap, and cosmetics

loans.name: Mareme Babou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 4 femmes a été crée depuis le cycle premier du banc villageois. Elles sont unies par de bonnes 

relations sociales économiques et professionnelles.

Madame Mareme, la responsable est âgée de 35 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants dont une fille et un garçon. Tous les deux sont scolarisés. Elle debout à droite de la photo .Elle s'active dans le commerce de tissus et de chaussures depuis longtemps et dispose d'une bonne expérience.

Son nouveau crédit de 500000 lui permettra de se payer des balles de tissus divers et des paires de chaussures 

qu'elle va revendre au détails au niveau de son quartier.

Les bénéfices tirés de son activités lui permet de payer les frais de scolarité de ses enfants et de renforcer 

ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group, made up of four women, has been in existence since the first cycle of the Banc Villageois.  The four members of the group are united by good social, economic and professional ties.

Mareme, the group's representative, is 35 years old.  She is married and the mother of two children, a girl and a boy.  Both her children go to school.  In the photo,  she is the woman on the right-hand side.  She has been actively involved in retail for a long time, selling fabrics and shoes, and she is an experienced seller.

Her new loan of 500,000 CFA francs will allow her to buy bales of various fabrics as well as shoes, which she will resell on a retail basis in her own neighborhood.  With the profits from her business, she is able to pay her children's school fees and strengthen her savings with the Banc Villageois.

loans.use: to buy bales of fabrics and some shoes.

loans.name: Senia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Senia de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, por motivos económicos ya no pudo continuar y se dedicó a la venta de ropa particular, trabajo que ella aprendió desde muy joven. Ella actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa en pequeñas cantidades y vende en las comunidades aledañas a su lugar, ella vive junto con su mamá.  

Cuenta con 3 años de experiencia en  lo que es este oficio, lo aprendió ya que ella trabajaba en un bazar de ropa, fue ahí como ella adquirió experiencia en estas ventas, actualmente ella tiene su propio negocio del cual genera sus ingresos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar ropa para niños, jóvenes y adultos de ambos sexos, esa es la demanda de su mercado en las comunidades que ella visita a diario;  comprara, camisetas, blusas, etc. 

Ella a futuro pretende que si vende más de su producto,   obtendrá más ingresos así,  que día con día le generen un estilo de vida diferente y así también poder ayudarle a su mamá.
texts.en:
Senia is 23 years old and studied through the sixth grade. For economic reasons she was unable to continue.  She works selling clothing, a business that she learned when she was young.  She currently works selling clothing in small quantities and selling it in neighboring communities close to where she lives.  She lives together with her mother.

She has three years of experience in this field.  She learned by working in a clothing bazaar. There she acquired experience in sales, and currently she has her own business which generates her income.

She is asking for a loan in order to purchase clothing for children, young people and adults of both sexes.  That is the demand in the community markets that she visits each day.  She will buy t-shirts, blouses, etc.  

In the future she hopes to sell more product, and thus obtain more income, which day by day will help her generate a different style of life and thus be able to help her mother.

loans.use: To buy clothing for children, young people, and adults for both men and women.

loans.name: Oeur's Group

texts.en:
Oeur is 60 years old, widowed, and has five children. She is a citizen of Moung Ruusey district of Battambang province. The main source of her income is rice farming, which she has been doing for 12 years. She earns 31,800 KHR per day. 

Oeur is the leader of her group, which consists of three members who are in the third cycle loan with VisionFund Cambodia. They are requesting loans for 1,400,000 KHR for each group member. As the leader, she will use her loan to buy fertilizer and insecticide and to pay a plowing fee. She hopes to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and insecticide and to pay a plowing fee

loans.name: Kunduz

texts.ru: Кундуз 39 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Кундуз - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кундуз занимается животноводством, стартовав 17 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кундуз, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кундуз обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кундуз планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома.
texts.en:
Kunduz is 39 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising three children. Kunduz has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Kunduz raises livestock, having begun 17 years ago with a livestock purchase of 5,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Kunduz currently has on her homestead: three dairy cows. Monthly income amounts to 16,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homesteadm Kunduz applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan - to purchase cows for expanding her livestock count. Kunduz plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals, and plans to save money for the construction of a new home.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Gift

texts.en:
Gift trades in cosmetics within the town center in Lyantonde. Her husband started the business for her after the family had expanded and the expenses were too many for him to meet alone. She uses the money from the shop to provide for the daily family needs and clothing for the children while her husband pays rent, tuition, and bills. 

Gift is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase cosmetics to sell. She anticipates that the shop will become the leading seller of all cosmetics in that area. Pictured is Gift with her husband in the shop.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru: Назокат ответственная, решительная и деятельная женщина в возрасте 41 года. Она в своем районе Гиссар работает заместителем директора сельской школы. Назокат замужем за дехканина. У них двое детей школьного возраста. В свободное от работы времени Назокат помогает мужу в земледельческой деятельности. Она занимается растениеводством в течение 5 лет и научилась этому у своего мужа. Так как сейчас сезон посева, Назокат и ее муж активно готовятся к посеву. Для приобретения семян картофеля Назокат обратилась за кредитом. В будущем их семья хочет расширить орошаемый участок земли и увеличить посев урожая.
texts.en:
Nazokat is a responsible, strong and active woman aged 41. She works as deputy director of rural school in her region Gissar. Nazokat is married to a farmer. They have two school-aged children. In her free time from work, Nazokat helps her husband with the agricultural activities. She has been raising crops over the course of five years and learned this from her husband. Since it is now the spring planting season, Nazokat and her husband are actively preparing for the planting.

In order to purchase seed potatoes, Nazokat applied for a loan. In the future, their family wants to expand their irrigated land and increase crop yield.

loans.use: to purchase seed potatoes for completing the spring planting

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина из района Шахритус начинает новый бизнес. Она по профессии швея. Ей 27 лет. Парвина замужем за Шухрата. У них двое очаровательных дочерей, которым по 5 и 2 года. В данный момент Парвина и ее муж собираются начать семейный торговый бизнес. Они планируют заняться продажей женской одежды и уже приобрели торговую точку на рынке. Для купли товара они просят кредит, так как их начального капитала недостаточно. Парвина и Шухрат считают, что новый бизнес будет прибыльным и они смогут за счет него улучшить финансовое положение семьи. Они будут работать вместе и уже верят в успех. Они надеются, что и кредиторы Kiva поверят в них и дадут им шанс начать свой бизнес.
texts.en: Parvina, from the Shahrituz region, is starting a new business. She is a tailor by profession, 27 years old and married to Shuhrat. They have two charming daughters aged five and two. At the moment, Parvina and her husband are getting ready to start a family retail business. They are planning to sell women's clothing and have already acquired a business location at the market. They are looking for a loan to purchase stock, since they don't have enough starting capital. Parvina and Shuhrat believe that the new business will be profitable and that they will be able to earn enough to improve their family's financial situation. They will work together and are confident in their success. They hope that Kiva lenders will believe in them too and give them the chance to start their business.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing to open a shop

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María de 43 años es casada y tiene una hija de 17 años de edad. María trabaja en su vivienda en donde tiene un pequeño taller de costura en zapatería. Ella tiene un pequeño contrato con una industria de calzado quien le provee de la materia prima y ella realiza la costura a mano en el calzado de hombres y de mujeres. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para el encementado toda su vivienda que tiene un área de 40 metros cuadrados. María sabe que deberá cumplir con todas las cuotas que este préstamo implica.
texts.en:
Maria is 43 years old, she is married, and she has a 17-year-old daughter.  Maria works from home where she has a small shoe-making workshop.  She has a small contract with a shoe company in the footwear industry and they provide a lot of the supplies and materials she needs to make men's and women's shoes by hand.

Maria is seeking a loan from FUSAI so that she can buy cement, sand, and gravel so that she can install a floor in her home, which is an area of 40 square meters (430 square feet). Maria will comply with the re-payment schedule of the loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel in order to install a floor in her home, which is 40 square meters (430 square feet)

loans.name: Esperanza Y Progreso De Huaycan Group

texts.es: Linda es socia de la Alcancía Comunal “Esperanza y Progreso De Huaycán”  la cual lo conforman 07 socios. Linda brinda servicios como asistente contable en una tienda de ferretería, trabajo que le ha generado ingresos para su hogar. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de su terreno, pues a futuro piensa construir y alquilarlo. Linda de 23 años es soltera. El grupo  “Esperanza y Progreso De Huaycán” agradecen a los inversionistas Kiva por el crédito brindado. Linda es la segunda del lado derecho y viste polo rosado.
texts.en:
Linda is a member of the Communal Bank "Esperanza y Progreso De Huaycán" [Hope and Progress of Huaycán], which consists of 7 members. Linda serves as an accounting assistant in a hardware store, work that has generated income for her home. The loan she requested will be used to purchase her land, because in the future she plans to build on it and rent it. Linda is 23 years old and is single. 

The group "Esperanza y Progreso De Huaycán" thanks the Kiva investors for the loan provided. Linda is the second from the right, wearing the pink shirt.

loans.use: to purchase her land in order to build on it and rent it
